channel.title: The Missing Mod?????????
channel.description: Well i am basically new to the whole halflife story as i didnt paly the first 3 till 2007-2008 and just got Half-Life2 this year. However even long before that I had been a fan (Youtube got me addicted to Half-Life). Just about any Half-Life fan worth a load of dirt knows about the 7 hours war and tons of movies (most suck) on it...... However why not a mod. There are mod for alot of things 99% not even haveing to do with Half-Life or just barely. So why not a mod for the 7hours war. I mean if people are affraid at makeing a bad mod theres no way they can make it as bad as Awakening (take it away mommy take it away) Maybe some of you other guys can enlighten me as to why there is not a mod for this or if theres one being made ??? :frowning: :meh:

item.title: The Missing Mod?????????
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
The problem with Combine Destiny was that you spent 90% of the time fighting zombies, which you could do as Gordon Freeman, so being a Combine was pretty irrelevant. Plus the scenery was very dull.

Ravenholm was okay in parts, but very annoying and nonsensical in others. Eye of the Storm was indeed good, if rather too fast-paced.

Read full topic

item.title: The Missing Mod?????????
item.dc:creator: Eric_Fong
item.description:
Dias:

Not true. I’ve played plenty of mods that were shit and got released. Combine Destiny, Ravenholm, Perfect Stride Continuum, Mistake Of Pythagoras, Pilotable Strider Mod

and lets not forget “Awakening”.

Ravenholm is not shit, and the sequel “Eye of the Storm” is very good.

Read full topic

item.description:
CooldKindJR:

if it was shit they wouldnt be makeing a sequel

They’re not a company. It’s not like if the game didn’t sell well no one would fund the second. And the game was even more bland and repetitious then Halo.

item.title: The Missing Mod?????????
item.dc:creator: Master_Chef
item.description:
What makes you think that sequels are a good thing?

-Matrix
-Alien
-Star Wars

Guess what they all had in common? They had sucky sequels.

-AVPR
-Predator 2
-Saw
-Scary Movies

Guess what all these sequels had in common? Yup, their prequels sucked, too.

Read full topic

item.title: The Missing Mod?????????
item.dc:creator: Wasabi
item.description:
Master Chef:

Yeah, but won’t BM need the OB engine? I thought I heard that it only needs HL2, but those graphics look like it might need more advanced editions of source.

The Orange Box version of the SDK Base is provided to people with any (Valve) Source Engine Game (well, the ones in this list). The reason that HL2Wars specifically requires Episode 2 is because it uses several resources from the game itself such as the Hunters, tree models, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: The Missing Mod?????????
item.dc:creator: CooldKindJR
item.description:
Dias:

HL2 wars is mostly for proof of concept. Only has a few maps, and is filled with bugs. I got stuck with soldiers falling through the ground so many times.

It should have put this in the last post but I forgot about it . It’s supose to have new maps and multiplayer soon. Well if it’s not dead after all it’s only a Beta. I hope it isn’t because playing hl2=Half-Life 2 ( for thoes who are gonna complain) in rts form would be very interesting dont you guys think?

Read full topic

Trilby:

Back on topic:
The 7 hour war could be interesting as an RTS. Thoughts?

https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-2-wars

I think this is a great idea if implemented well. I’m thinking several Human factions (UN, for starters) , Universal Union faction, and maybe a Xen wildlife faction that teleports random headcrabs and bullsquids and pals across the map.
